greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Min { k | A064916(k) = n }.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
formula: For n > 2: a(n) = if n is prime then n else 2*n - 2.
program: (PARI) lpf(n)= { local(f); f=factor(n); return(f[1, 1]) } { for (n=2, 1000, k=1; until (m==n, k++; L=lpf(k); m=k / L + L - 1); write("b064919.txt", n, " ", k) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Sep 29 2009
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 14 2001
